description: Gordon Ramsay is a British chef, restaurateur, writer, and television personality. He has been awarded a total of 16 Michelin Stars, and is known for his fiery personality and no-nonsense approach to cooking. Ramsay began his culinary career at the age of 19, training with some of the world's top chefs in London and Paris. He later opened his own restaurants, including the three-Michelin-starred Restaurant Gordon Ramsay in London. .
treating: Gordon Ramsay's signature dish is Beef Wellington, which is a filet of beef wrapped in puff pastry and served with mushroom duxelles and a red wine reduction. He is also known for his roasted scallops with pea puree and bacon vinaigrette.

instructions: Wrap in puff pastry with mushroom duxelles
